metadata.name: Fissure
metadata.description:
An anonymous woman visiting the Alps finds herself isolated from the post apocalyptic world.  

These reimagined scenes form a prelude to Marlen Haushofer’s dystopian survival novel “The Wall”.

“…there really was something invisible, smooth and cool blocking my path. I thought it might be a hallucination, but of course I knew that it was nothing of the kind. I could have coped much more easily with a momentary insanity than with this terrible, invisible thing.”
